title: SET_BLIP_COLOUR
content:
0x03D7FB09E75D6B7E0xBB3C5A41// SetBlipColour
void SET_BLIP_COLOUR(Blip blip, int color);Parameters:blip: The blip handle to set the color ofcolor: This can be a hex color code, or a blip color.Examples:Lualocal coords = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
local blip = AddBlipForCoord(coords.x, coords.y, coords.z)

SetBlipColour(blip, 1) -- Sets the color to red (see list above)

-- You can also use a hex like so:
SetBlipColour(blip, 0x3A7F3AFF) -- Our custom green

// SetBlipColour
void SET_BLIP_COLOUR(Blip blip, int color);

local coords = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
local blip = AddBlipForCoord(coords.x, coords.y, coords.z)

SetBlipColour(blip, 1) -- Sets the color to red (see list above)

-- You can also use a hex like so:
SetBlipColour(blip, 0x3A7F3AFF) -- Our custom green
